## 1. Executive summary
* All three experts welcome a **6-day blended course** that creates installer-sales hybrids able to get jobs or launch micro-firms in Mosul first, then nationwide.

### 4. Consolidated qualitative insights (clustered)

| **Dust & cleaning** | Year-2 under-performance blamed on dirt; hurts word-of-mouth. | All three | Add cleaning SOP, live “dirty vs clean” watt-demo, O&M upsell module. |
| **Mounting / wind load** | Cheap custom frames shift or rip off; headline failures on social media. | مؤيد, حسّام | Structural calculation worksheet + torque-wrench practical + supplier kit. |
| **Finance barrier** | 10 k USD lump sum blocks adoption. | حسّام, Ali | Module on instalment plans; invite micro-finance & MoLSA loan scheme. |
| **Social proof** | “Neighbour did it” converts sceptics faster than ROI tables. | حسّام, Ali | Library of local case-studies; trainees photograph installs for portfolio. |
| **Market research gap** | SMEs skip user-research and bookkeeping. | حسّام, مؤيد | Day 5 field survey + cash-book template; peer-presentation of findings. |
